title: Heritage Document Recommendation System
description: An intelligent recommendation system for heritage documents using Knowledge Graphs, autoencoders, and advanced ranking algorithms. Collects data from Wikipedia, UNESCO, Indian Heritage databases, and Archive.org to provide semantic-based recommendations through SimRank, Horn's Index, and Firework Algorithm optimization.

title: TaskGenie
description: An AI-powered assistant that helps interns and developers transform vague task descriptions into clear, actionable requirements with contextual details and suggestions.

title: ClashVision
description: A competitive gaming analytics platform providing real-time insights and performance tracking for players. Features interactive dashboards and data visualization.

title: Portfolio Website
description: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with Next.js 15 showcasing projects, skills, and professional journey. Features clean design, smooth animations, and optimized performance.
